2025-12-03JUSOther Than Statutory AuthorityAppointment of a Judge of the Court of King’s Bench of New Brunswick, Trial Division, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal of New BrunswickAppointment of Mario J. Lanteigne of the city of Bathurst, in the Province of New Brunswick, Barrister-at-law, to be a Judge of the Court of King’s Bench of New Brunswick, Trial Division, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal of New Brunswick.N/A
subject: Appointment of a Judge of the Court of King’s Bench of New Brunswick, Trial Division, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal of New Brunswick
precis: Appointment of Mario J. Lanteigne of the city of Bathurst, in the Province of New Brunswick, Barrister-at-law, to be a Judge of the Court of King’s Bench of New Brunswick, Trial Division, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal of New Brunswick.
